text: The 1920 Drexel Dragons football team represented Drexel Institute—now known as Drexel University—in the 1920 college football season. Led by William McAvoy in his first season as head coach, the team compiled a record of 0–6. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Drexel Category:Drexel Dragons football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Drexel Football
title: 1920 Drexel Dragons football team
